mapper.insert:
insert into tb_seller (s_businessnum, s_pw, s_firstname, s_lastname, s_email, s_tel, s_birth, s_zipcode, s_address, s_restaddress) values(#{s_businessnum}, #{s_pw}, #{s_firstname}, #{s_lastname}, #{s_email}, #{s_tel}, #{s_birth}, #{s_zipcode}, #{s_address}, #{s_restaddress})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO tb_seller_info (s_idx, s_profile, s_storename) VALUES (#{s_idx}, '기본프로필.png', CONCAT('rootstore', #{s_idx}))
mapper.select: select * from tb_seller s, tb_seller_state ss, tb_seller_info si where s.s_idx = ss.s_idx and s.s_idx = si.s_idx and s_businessnum = #{s_businessnum} and ss.s_cancel = 'N'
mapper.update: update tb_seller set s_lastlogindate = now() where s_idx = #{s_idx}

update tb_seller set
s_pw = #{s_pw}, s_modifydate = now(), s_pwmodifydate = now()
s_firstname = #{s_firstname}, s_lastname = #{s_lastname}, s_tel = #{s_tel}, s_birth = #{s_birth}, s_zipcode = #{s_zipcode}, s_address = #{s_address}, s_restaddress = #{s_restaddress}, s_modifydate = now()
where s_idx = #{s_idx}

UPDATE tb_seller_info si JOIN tb_seller s ON si.s_idx = s.s_idx
SET si.s_profile = #{s_profile}, si.s_storename = #{s_storename}, si.s_storeintro = #{s_storeintro}, s.s_modifydate = NOW()
SET si.s_profile = "기본프로필.png", si.s_storename = #{s_storename}, si.s_storeintro = #{s_storeintro}, s.s_modifydate = NOW()
WHERE s.s_idx = #{s_idx};
mapper.select: select * from tb_seller s, tb_seller_state ss, tb_seller_info si where s.s_idx = ss.s_idx and s.s_idx = si.s_idx and s.s_idx = #{s_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_seller_state ss JOIN tb_seller s ON ss.s_idx = s.s_idx SET ss.s_cancel = 'Y', s.s_modifydate = NOW() WHERE s.s_idx = #{s_idx};
